description:
The Special Edition Pack features a set of cosmetic items that will make your Survivor stand out on the battlefield! Show off your style with a complete outfit, celebrate your wins with a victory pose, and escape with character using a fun vehicle skin!

Contains:
- Customizable Costume items
Souvenir Jacket (Midnight Black)
Skinny Jeans (Black)
Slip-On Shoes (Gray)
Casual Watch (Black)
- Victory Pose "Two Handed-Good"
- Vehicle Skin "Dragon (Yellow)"
name: DRAGON BALL: THE BREAKERS - Special Edition Pack
